translated: “The best of the snakes has entered here,
I wish to be released from the color of the rock;
I cannot eat, though I am hungry.”

analyzed: saḥ brahma gutto ciram eva jīva
translated: “May you live a long time, having the goodness of Brahmā,
And may your heavenly food appear to you;
You who honor the color of Brahmā,
You cannot eat, though you are hungry.”
The Snake Birth Story is the fourth.
